subtitle: Enter vendor strings or upload photos of packaging. The agent handles the research.

input_queue.title: Input Queue
input_queue.placeholder:
Ex: HP CF234A Imaging Drum
Kyocera DK-7105...
Paste data here...

how_it_works.title: How It Works
how_it_works.step1_desc: Simultaneous broad and deep search for maximum coverage.
how_it_works.step2_desc: Cross-verification of sources to eliminate hallucinations.
how_it_works.step3_desc: If data is missing, agent autonomously generates new queries.

tips.title: Quality Tips
tips.desc: For best results, use full MPNs. Photo recognition works best with clear label shots.
